items.title: How Obama maneuvered behind the scenes to fight Trump on redistricting
items.description: The ex-president’s involvement reflects the deep anxieties he has about Trump’s agenda and has propelled him into a more political, public-facing role...

items.title: Nancy Pelosi has a new challenger. He doesn’t want to talk about her.
items.description: Scott Wiener, a California state senator, says his run is “not about other candidates” — including Pelosi.

items.title: Can anyone stop Trump’s teardown of the East Wing?
items.description: Many preservationists fear the answer is no. A pro-Trump review board is expected to approve the president’s planned 90,000-square-foot ballroom, too.

items.title: U.S. kills two aboard alleged drug boat in Pacific, widening Trump’s campaign
items.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth announced the strike but, consistent with others, declined to identify the victims or offer evidence verifying they wer...

items.title: Former GOP senator John Sununu announces bid for old seat in New Hampshire
items.description: Sununu is aiming to replace retiring Sen. Jeanne Shaheen in a race in which his party hopes to replace a Democrat with a Republican.
